name: Denniffia
overview: A great looking space shoot-em-up that features some special bonuses which you can obtain by picking up certain letters dropped by destroyed enemies. S gives a protective shield which will protect you for a short period against enemy fire. P gives you extra power rockets which can be fired by pressing space and V which gives you some extra velocity to avoid enemies more easily. I grants limited immortality so you can destroy enemies by ramming them. ? gives you an unknown bonus which varies over time. The game was developed by the teams at Electric Brains Production, as well as New Entry. Coding: Michal Bacík Graphics: Nikaj Eijk Sound/Music: Kristian Røstøen, Glenn Rune Gallefoss, and Kjell Nordbø Published in 64'er 1996/08.
